document.full_text: a much-delayed u.n. panel set up to investigate last year's israeli attack on an aid convoy bound for gaza is now due to report back next month, u.n. chief ban ki-moon said on monday.
document.title: u.n. chief says gaza flotilla panel to report in july
lines_and_colors: a much-delayed u.n. panel set up to investigate last year's israeli attack on an aid convoy bound for gaza is now due to report back next month, u.n. chief ban ki-moon said on monday.
